Body:
melds = Melds()
hand_sets = [Card('A', 'S'), Card('A', 'H'), Card('A', 'D'), Card('A', 'C'),
    Card('2', 'S'), Card('2', 'H'), Card('2', 'D'), Card('2', 'C')]
hand_runs = [Card('A', 'S'), Card('2', 'S'), Card('3', 'S'), Card('4', 'S'),
    Card('5', 'S'), Card('6', 'S'), Card('7', 'S'), Card('8', 'S')]
hand_set_and_run = [Card('3', 'S'), Card('3', 'H'), Card('3', 'D'), Card(
    '3', 'C'), Card('5', 'S'), Card('6', 'S'), Card('7', 'S'), Card('8', 'S')]
hand_crossover = [Card('3', 'S'), Card('3', 'H'), Card('3', 'D'), Card('A',
    'C'), Card('2', 'C'), Card('3', 'C'), Card('4', 'C'), Card('5', 'C')]
hand_none = [Card('3', 'S'), Card('5', 'H'), Card('8', 'D'), Card('K', 'C'),
    Card('Q', 'S'), Card('3', 'H'), Card('4', 'D'), Card('5', 'C')]
assert [0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0] == melds.find_discard_scores(hand_sets)
assert [0, 1, 3, 0, 0, 15, 8, 0] == melds.find_discard_scores(hand_runs)
assert [0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 20, 19, 0] == melds.find_discard_scores(hand_set_and_run
    )
assert [6, 6, 6, 0, 1, 12, 5, 0] == melds.find_discard_scores(hand_crossover)
assert [50, 48, 45, 40, 41, 50, 49, 48] == melds.find_discard_scores(hand_none)
